column17:
Nutrition is the most important element to keep healthy. Havells' automatic rice cooking programs preserves the freshness and nutrients in every bowl of rice. This compact sized electric cooker is an ideal choice for a faster and convenient way of cooking rice. It is powered by 700W of power input for faster cooking and features a capacity of 1.8 litres. Also it has a hard anodized cooking bowl and comes with a special hygienic trivet tray for preventing sticking of rice .
